attributes.review: took several hours to download and when i opened it, it gave me such weird vibes. everything was mostly fine until i got out of the app. the fbi arrived at my door claiming that if i didn’t vote trump 2020 i would be sent to china.
attributes.title: don’t get this app!

attributes.review:
I downloaded to try and learn more about Trump and what he stands for... however this app literally took all my data and kept crashing! 
All my pictures - gone
All my phone connections - gone
All my apps - gone
All my personal information - probably leaked.
DO NOT TRUST
attributes.title: BEWARE 😳😤🤬
